title: Clubhouse introduces new protected profiles option in response to Russia-Ukraine war
content:
Clubhouse on Wednesday announced a new option on its platform that will let users protect their profiles so that other users cannot see their latest interactions on the app. The new feature comes as a response to Russia’s invasion of Ukraine and is intended to ensure users feel safe having conversations on the social network.

more…

The post Clubhouse introduces new protected profiles option in response to Russia-Ukraine war appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Clubhouse announced a new option that will let users protect their profiles so that other users cannot see their latest interactions.
